post:
Hello everyone,

Hassan here from Hostodo.com to present one of our new OpenVZ Cloud/Reseller VPS plans, as well as some regular OpenVZ VPS offers. The way our Cloud plan works is you get a resource pool and have the ability to create and destroy your own VPS instances. You can provision VPSs in Los Angeles, Dallas, and Miami.

We accept PayPal, Credit Card (through Stripe), and Skrill at this time.

[Join our affiliate program and get 10%!](https://hostodo.com/portal/affiliates.php)

Test IPv4: LA.hostodo.com  
Test Asia Optimized: la.asia.hostodo.com Test IPv6: LA6.hostodo.com  
[http://LA.hostodo.com/10mb.test](http://LA.hostodo.com/10mb.test)  
[http://LA.hostodo.com/100mb.test](http://LA.hostodo.com/100mb.test)

Test IPv6: MIA6.hostodo.com  
[http://MIA.hostodo.com/10mb.test](http://MIA.hostodo.com/10mb.test)  
[http://MIA.hostodo.com/100mb.test](http://MIA.hostodo.com/100mb.test)

[http://TX.hostodo.com/10mb.test](http://TX.hostodo.com/10mb.test)  
[http://TX.hostodo.com/100mb.test](http://TX.hostodo.com/100mb.test)

* * *
  

We do not allow any CPU intensive processes on our nodes, if you plan on using over 90% of a core for an extended period of time you will be suspended. Legal adult content, private VPNs, private proxies are all allowed. Bulk mail is not allowed, BitCoin mining or similar is not allowed along with anything that is illegal in the state of California. You can read our full Terms of Service at: [https://hostodo.com/portal/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=1](https://hostodo.com/portal/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=1)
